alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Eastern Essex; Eastern Hanover; Richmond; Western Essex; Western Hanover; Western King William; Western King and Queen; Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 1:57PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern King and Queen, west central Richmond, west central Westmoreland, Caroline, central Hanover, northwestern King William and Essex Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 157 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Milford, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tappahannock, Bowling Green, Champlain, Saint Stephens Church, Milford, Hanover, Port Royal, Manquin, Beulahville, Dawn, Loretto, Leedstown, Mangohick, Fort A.p. Hill, Ladysmith, Newtown, Aylett, Kings Dominion, Studley and Millers Tavern. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Caroline; Eastern Essex; Eastern Hanover; Richmond; Western Essex; Western Hanover; Western King William; Western King and Queen; Westmoreland
